name: Rakuna Utopia Remastered
description:
I present "Rakuna Utopia Remastered" a spiritual sequel of "Wario Land" control Rakuna, recover the 25 cyan diamonds, find all the treasures and thus save your 4 nieces captured by a mysterious enemy. 

Remaster of "Rakuna Utopia" with great new features :

-New physics engine

-New gameplay

-Enemy/Boss redesigned

-Segment added in the levels

-World map

-New music

-New cinematics

A revised difficulty, a new and better version of the game! A game style closer to a Wario Land ! Go through 25 levels + 3 hidden ones, collect all the treasures AND MORE ! For more information, follow the information on my Twitter : https://twitter.com/ViciousGames3
